directions: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Saute onion, green pepper and garlic until tender. Stir in chicken broth, chicken pieces and the diced tomatoes and chilies. Simmer covered for at least 10 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
title: Spicy Chicken Soup
